item.title: Data

item.title: Info
item.description: Software You first need to download and install: Latest R (v4.0.4) Latest RStudio Open RStudio, and type the following command in the R console: install.packages("tidyverse") We’ll use a collection of R packages called tidyverse throughout the course. We’ll use a collection of R packages called fpp3 throughout the course. Textbook Forecasting: Principles and Practice by Rob J Hyndman and George Athanasopoulos Reading Credits Earo Wang
